alert.note: Alert for Eastern Monmouth; Hunterdon; Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Ocean; Somerset; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 12:12AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Ocean, southeastern Hunterdon, Mercer, northeastern Burlington, Somerset, Monmouth, Middlesex and southeastern Bucks Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1210 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Newtown, Pennsylvania to near Chatsworth, New Jersey. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Trenton, New Brunswick, Perth Amboy, Long Branch, Asbury Park, Somerville, Sandy Hook, Somerset, Edison, Lakewood, Middletown, Old Bridge, Jackson, Howell, East Brunswick, Bridgewater, South Brunswick, Sayreville and North Brunswick. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 6 and 13. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 356 and 359. Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 32 and 42. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 34. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 50 and 76. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 20, and between mile markers 26 and 29. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 87 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Monmouth; Hunterdon; Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Ocean; Somerset; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth
